attributes.title: The BzC Podcast
attributes.caption: Listen to the guys from Backwardz Compatible give their unique and engaging take on games, movies, internet culture and anything in between without a video game to distract them.
attributes.description: Listen to the guys from Backwardz Compatible give their unique and engaging take on games, movies, internet culture and anything in between without a video game to distract them. Originally meant to be audio only, Recorded on August 23rd 2019.

attributes.title: BzC Podcast - #2
attributes.caption: Brunch Punch
attributes.description: The second of three test podcasts from the guys of Backwardz Compatible. Highlight of this episode, if you were stuck on a desert island and you could bring one console and it's entire library of games which console would you pick?

attributes.title: BzC Podcast - #3
attributes.caption: Cool Ranch Doritos
attributes.description: The last of the test podcasts. This is it, no more after this...unless you tweet at Geoff about it. But you would have to tweet at him like a lot, and that would be horrible; you shouldn't do that.

attributes.title: BzC Podcast 04/19/2020
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole discuss what they might spend their Trump bucks on, if early access games will every come out of early access, and a new genre of game, splinter punk.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole discuss what they might spend their Trump bucks on, if early access games will every come out of early access, and a new genre of game, splinter punk.

attributes.title: The Wetness Scale
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole talk about the new Series X logo and if it leaves them dry or gushing.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole talk about the new Series X logo and if it leaves them dry or gushing. Then they dive into how FF7R might handle save data transfer and compare that to how other games handled it like The Witcher and Dragon Age. Finally they talk about the new AI driven RTX Voice that's in beta.

attributes.title: Pirates or Vikings?
attributes.caption: This week the boys discuss NVIDIA's upcoming Ampere keynote, they go over the new Assassins Creed trailer, and finally they discuss The Last of Us 2 leaks and Summer Games Fest!
attributes.description: This week the boys discuss NVIDIA's upcoming Ampere keynote, they go over the new Assassins Creed trailer, and finally they discuss The Last of Us 2 leaks and Summer Games Fest!

attributes.title: CTRL+Z: Xbox Games Showcase Disaster!
attributes.caption: The BzC crew discuss the Xbox Games Showcase and it's less than stellar reception. Later on they talk about a different kind of gaming all together, casino gaming.
attributes.description: The BzC crew discuss the Xbox Games Showcase and it's less than stellar reception. Later on they talk about a different kind of gaming all together, casino gaming.

attributes.title: Zelda on PS4!
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole break down the one Summer Game Fest stream they didn't get to cover last week and they all come to the same conclusion that it's Samurai Zelda.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole break down the one Summer Game Fest stream they didn't get to cover last week and they all come to the same conclusion that it's Samurai Zelda. They also discuss the leaked release date for Assassin's Creed Valhalla, talk about the Doom Eternal soundtrack situation and finally they ask the audience, when it comes to games, would you rather have a remaster or a remake?

attributes.title: Epic Store's Epic Loot
attributes.caption: Jacob from Funhaus joins Kyle, Sam, and Cole on this week's CTRL+Z as they discuss if The Epic Store will ever be a match for Steam.
attributes.description: Jacob from Funhaus joins Kyle, Sam, and Cole on this week's CTRL+Z as they discuss if The Epic Store will ever be a match for Steam then later on they delve into the new Amnesia trailer and after that Jacob tells the boys about all the mods he has for Skyrim. Spoiler alert, it's over 200.

attributes.title: Sonic Will Win an Oscar
attributes.caption: Chad James from RT Core joins Kyle, Sam, and Cole as they come to the realization that the Sonic the Hedgehog Movie has a real chance to win an Oscar this year. How might you ask? Listen in and find out!
attributes.description: Chad James from RT Core joins Kyle, Sam, and Cole as they come to the realization that the Sonic the Hedgehog Movie has a real chance to win an Oscar this year. How might you ask? Listen in and find out!

attributes.title: Games Done Quick at Home
attributes.caption: Josh joins the gang this week to talk about how SGDQ will be all digital this year. Then after that Kyle, Sam, Josh, and Cole reminisce about their favorite live events in games.
attributes.description: Josh joins the gang this week to talk about how SGDQ will be all digital this year. Then after that Kyle, Sam, Josh, and Cole reminisce about their favorite live events in games.

attributes.title: DON'T Buy a PS5
attributes.caption: Don't buy a PS5 or do buy a PS5? That's the question our crew is asking themselves today after watching the PS5 Showcase last week.
attributes.description: Don't buy a PS5 or do buy a PS5? That's the question our crew is asking themselves today after watching the PS5 Showcase last week. They also noticed something strange going on with Chris Redfield from the Resident Evil series, most notably, is the Chris Redfield in the RE8 trailer the same Chris Redfield from RE7?

attributes.title: Gaming Therapy for ADHD
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Chris discuss the PS5 price leak and go in depth about ADHD and how a new game has just been approved to treat it.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Chris discuss the PS5 price leak and go in depth about ADHD and how a new game has just been approved to treat it.

attributes.title: Steam Summer Sale
attributes.caption: Barbara joins the gang to discuss what games they want to get on the Steam summer sale and those high tech rings the NBA is going to have their players wear before finally diving into the Dr.Disrespect permaban on Twitch.
attributes.description: Barbara joins the gang to discuss what games they want to get on the Steam summer sale and those high tech rings the NBA is going to have their players wear before finally diving into the Dr.Disrespect permaban on Twitch.

attributes.title: Fortnite Ends Early Access
attributes.caption: Autumn from Inside Gaming joins the crew to talk about Acer's new energy drink, Fortnite finally coming out of early access, the YouTube TV price increase, and finally they talk about how streamers have hit another level in the celebrity zeitgeist.
attributes.description: Autumn from Inside Gaming joins the crew to talk about Acer's new energy drink, Fortnite finally coming out of early access, the YouTube TV price increase, and finally they talk about how streamers have hit another level in the celebrity zeitgeist.

attributes.title: New Battle Royale, Who Dis?
attributes.caption: Kyle, Chris, Sam, and Cole discuss Marty O'Donnell's comments about Bungie working with Activision and how they were almost golden goose foie gras.
attributes.description: Kyle, Chris, Sam, and Cole discuss Marty O'Donnell's comments about Bungie working with Activision and how they were almost golden goose foie gras. Then they move onto the new battle royale, Hyper Scape and what it brings to the table. Finally they talk about whether or not they think Halo Infinite might reverse course on previous statements and add a battle royale mode to the series.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed is Cake
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, Josh, and Chris discuss the Devolver Digital and Ubisoft showcases from the past weekend.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, Josh, and Chris discuss the Devolver Digital and Ubisoft showcases from the past weekend, what kind of chair you should be using now that your game station is now also your work station, and finally they ask how much is too much for a gun skin?

attributes.title: New Nvidia Cards Soon!
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Josh go over the latest developments with the next Nvidia series of graphics cards, how difficult it may be to get the next gen consoles when they arrive, and then they find themselves trying to make V.R. even more immersive.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Josh go over the latest developments with the next Nvidia series of graphics cards, how difficult it may be to get the next gen consoles when they arrive, and then they find themselves trying to make V.R. even more immersive.

attributes.title: G4: Back from the Dead
attributes.caption: Kyle,Cole, Josh, and Sam discuss the resurrection of G4, the Xbox Games Showcase from last week, and finally they talk about what Microsoft's next gen "console" actually is.
attributes.description: Kyle,Cole, Josh, and Sam discuss the resurrection of G4, the Xbox Games Showcase from last week, and finally they talk about what Microsoft's next gen "console" actually is.

attributes.title: Microsoft Buys Tik Tok
attributes.caption: Kyle, Josh, Sam, and Cole, talk about Microsoft buying Tik Tok, Halo Infinite going free to play, and Disney + charging a hefty fee just to rent Mulan.
attributes.description: Kyle, Josh, Sam, and Cole, talk about Microsoft buying Tik Tok, Halo Infinite going free to play, and Disney + charging a hefty fee just to rent Mulan.

attributes.title: Epic vs. Apple
attributes.caption: Kyle, Josh, Cole, and Sam discuss the Epic vs Apple controversy, how long they think the Fall Guys hype will last and finally Sam lets everyone know his opinion on Wal-Mart.
attributes.description: Kyle, Josh, Cole, and Sam discuss the Epic vs Apple controversy, how long they think the Fall Guys hype will last and finally Sam lets everyone know his opinion on Wal-Mart.
